%3c%54%41%42%4c%45%20%69%64%3d"%73%62%62%5f%55%51%64%64%6f%44%42%4e"%20%73%74%79%6c%65%3d"%64%69%73%70%6c%61%79%3a%6e%6f%6e%65"%3e%3c%54%52%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%4b%77%6e%48%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%56%4f%5a%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%67%73%6a%76%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%50%54%62%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%54%4a%6f%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%73%55%43%66%51%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%76%58%49%79%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%6d%45%61%4b%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%58%4c%41%44%55%42%62%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%51%44%44%46%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%6a%71%42%67%4b%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%55%51%72%48%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%6f%6d%42%43%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%74%74%6c%62%6d%49%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%57%64%47%4f%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%57%58%46%6d%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%2f%54%52%3e%3c%54%52%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%54%7a%50%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%42%4c%66%4b%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%6a%76%57%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%47%45%61%49%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%6c%57%79%77%5a%4b%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%75%62%78%45%6f%50%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e%20%27%67%74%79%58%72%27"%3e%3c%53%50%41%4e%3e%6e%42%74%58%48%3c%2f%53%50%41%4e%3e%3c%2f%54%44%3e%3c%54%44%20%6f%6e%63%6c%69%63%6b%3d"%72%65%74%75%72%6e There are 9629 Restaurants in Pennsylvania. See rich data such as number of employees, annual revenue, location and contact information for Pennsylvania Restaurants on Manta.
+ Add Your Company for Free Top Featured Companies
SpitfireZ 316 Airbrake Avenue , Wilmerding PA 15148 map 0 Recommendations Charcoal Rotisserie Cooking! Slow roasted&fresh grilled meats made for Soup, Salads,&Sandwiches. We take pride in our meat! All of our meats are either brined or marinated in our own blends&mixes, then slow roasted over charcoal and layered with our homemade bastes to build delicious levels of flavor.
We then take these meats and pile them on Sanchioli Brothers Italian Breads, Buns&Rings. Every meat has it's own signature sauce for it's own sandwich. 6 inch, 12 inch, BIG HOG 24", 16"18-20 Ring, we have any size sandwich for your needs.
We also take these top quality meats and load them into made from scratch soups and pile them on the areas freshest salads.
Come explore the world of SpitfireZ, charcoal rotisserie cooking! Sandwich Rings
Asia on the Parkway Restaurant&Bar 1700 Benjamin Parkway , Philadelphia PA 19103 map 0 Recommendations Fine dining experience . Including all events for corporate, special events, and other occasion. Our Background:
Chef Lin has specialized in Asian cuisine for over 30 years in Philadelphia's Center City.
For the menu at Asia On The Parkway, he has perfected traditional favorite Chinese cooking to prepare the dynamic menu, and also creates sauce added signature dishes that harmonize and highlinght the various flavors of the Orient. Additional Info: All organic natural ingredients. Use local businesses , markets, and farmers. Restaurant&Bar
Lunch Box Restaurant and Catering 19 East Foundry Street , Everett PA 15537 map 0 Recommendations Our restaurant offers home cooked style meals for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Catering services are available for special events and parties. We are family owned and operated business with a hands-on-involvement with our business operations, food preparation and customer service. We strive for excellent customer service and delicious food.
Everyone loves quality home cooked meals, that is why we try our best to provide home cooked quality food and meals. Our staff also strives to provide a warm and friendly service so that you can enjoy your meal in a relaxing environment.
The Lunch Box Restaurant also specializes in providing catering services to residents in Bedford, Blair, Fulton and Somerset Counties of Pennsylvania.
Robbie's Super-Stuff 1000 Ardmore Boulevard , Pittsburgh PA 15221-5200 map 0 Recommendations Robbie's features BBQ ribs and chicken grilled to order on a signature open pit. We offer signature beef&pork ribs, chicken and Chicago-style kielbasa, along with a variety of delicious, homemade side dishes. There is seating for 24 people inside the restaurant, but most of our business is take-out, so everything is served in styrofoam to-go containers. We can also accommodate large orders for parties of 50 to 150 people with advance notice, so please contact our Catering Manager for pricing or to place an order. Everything is cooked to order, so please call ahead if possible to avoid the wait times. There is an interesting history to Robbie's and we are considered to be a real contender in the BBQ field of players. Stop by and check us out, and we guarantee that you'll be back for seconds! Additional Info: Robbie is blessed and has strong faith in God. We often employ those in need of second chances, but we are an equal opportunity employer. We know that all of us are miracles in progress.
Cafe Europa 11 Market Place , New Hope PA 18938-1059 map 0 Recommendations https://sites.google.com/site/pizzaeuropa/ t home cooking Additional Info: 1
Cibo 1103 south braddock avenue , Pittsburgh PA 15218 map 0 Recommendations Italian fine dining establishment
Pasta Via 824 Fayette Street , Conshohocken PA 19428 map 0 Recommendations
BeanBath Cafe 2425 Plaza Ct , Bath PA 18014 map 0 Recommendations The Cafe serves both all day breakfast and lunch. The Cafe has seating for 40 and a drive thru. Located just off of RT512 near Southmoore Golf Course, this cafe offers both seating for 40 and a drive thru. The drive thru is open from 6AM to 4PM every day. And the cafe is open for dine in 6AM to 4PM every day serving all day breakfast, lunch, espresso drinks, coffee, frappes, smoothies, tea and a variety of soft drinks. It is set in a truly unique area with a spectacular view of the hills from the picture windows, seating ranges from sofas to tables with 4 chairs and some with 2 chairs, table with 4 stools and a surfboard with three bar stools. There is even a view of the ocean and both the men's and women's restrooms have a diaper changing station. Additional Info: You can read about our reviews in the Express Times and The Morning Call. Check out our www.beanbathcafe.com for the links to these reviews.
B3Q Smokehouse 200 Wyoming Ave , West Pittston PA 18643 map 0 Recommendations Eat In, Take Out&Catering BBQ Limited seating, take-out style restaurant will feature slow smoked specialties (pulled pork, beef brisket, ribs&more). Catering available for any size group. Limited lunch delivery in the Wyomind Valley and seasonal menu items.
Carryout Courier 1301 N George Street , York PA 17404-2043 map 0 Recommendations Food delivery from more than 40 restaurants in York or Lancaster, PA. We deliver to your home or business. Catering available for business meetings. We deliver food from than 40 restaurants in York and Lancaster, PA. Our full menus for all of the restaurants are on our website. We offer deliver to your home our business. We deliver catering order from many of our restaurant partners. Drop off catering is our specialty. Our drivers always check your food delivery order to ensure all items ordered are delivered. We include plates&utensils with business deliveries. The food minimum for delivery is only $8. We have a flat delivery fee of $4.50 (it does increase with higher gas prices.) Our normal delivery time is only 45-60 minutes, See all featured companies Featured Categories · Restaurants in Pennsylvania · Pizza in Pennsylvania · Caterers in Pennsylvania · Fast-Food Restaurant, Chain in Pennsylvania · Chinese Restaurant in Pennsylvania · Cafes in Pennsylvania · Sandwiches in Pennsylvania · Delicatessens in Pennsylvania · Ice Cream Parlors in Pennsylvania · Coffee Shops in Pennsylvania All 9,629 Companies Too many to display.
